body_html:
While we are waiting for the grand solution, can somebody with Google Contributor License Agreement add http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.12.02/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2 as a third URL (after mirror.bazel.build and pkgs.fedoraproject.org) in tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl?

A 3rd source, even one with mediocre uptime, is better than no 3rd source. No need to ask nasm.us for permission as they used to be the primary source.

body:
While we are waiting for the grand solution, can somebody with Google Contributor License Agreement add http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.12.02/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2 as a third URL (after mirror.bazel.build and pkgs.fedoraproject.org) in tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl?

A 3rd source, even one with mediocre uptime, is better than no 3rd source. No need to ask nasm.us for permission as they used to be the primary source.
